t:type.name: SyncDeviceState
t:type.t:description: Represents the currently defined reflexes for a given device from the platform's perspective

t:attribute.name: protocol
t:attribute.description: The protocol address of the device

t:attribute.name: platform
t:attribute.description: The platform address of the device

t:attribute.name: driver
t:attribute.description: The name of the driver that defined the current reflexes

t:attribute.name: version
t:attribute.description: The version of the driver that defined the current reflexes

t:attribute.name: hash
t:attribute.description: The hash code of the driver that defined the current reflexes
